OWL and SWRL
Qualified Cardinality Restrictions (I)
Qualified Cardinality Restrictions (QCR), which are more specific
than cardinality restrictions in that they state the class of objects
within the restriction.
Creating a Four Cheese Pizza, as subclass of NamedPizza, which
has exactly four cheese toppings.
Protege 3.4
